commits: 3165e0b: feat(prompt-detector): detect multiple choice prompts without cursor indicator
message: TDD implementation complete for Issue #193. Added DetectPromptOptions interface with requireDefaultIndicator flag, buildDetectPromptOptions() helper, updated all 7 P0+P1 call sites, added SEC-001/SEC-002/SEC-003 security fixes, and 20+ new tests. All 2835 unit tests pass. 0 ESLint errors. 0 TypeScript errors.
